# Bivariate relationship between World Happiness Score and GDP per capita

```{r}
data <-read.csv("C:/Users/HI/Documents/GitHub/pubpol543/2019.csv")
str(data)
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
base=ggplot(data=data) + theme_light()
hist1=base + geom_histogram(aes(Score))
hist1
```
```{r}
hist2=base + geom_histogram(aes(GDP.per.capita))
hist2
```


```{r}
data$NAME=as.character(data$NAME)
base=ggplot(data, aes(x=GDP.per.capita, y=Score))
plot1=base+geom_point()
plot1
```
```{r}
library(ggrepel)
plot1 + geom_text_repel(aes(label=NAME),size=2)
```

```{r}
plot1 + geom_text_repel(aes(label=ifelse(Score>=6,NAME, "")))
```
```{r}
base = ggplot(data, aes(x=GDP.per.capita,y=Score)) 
plot1= base +  geom_point() + xlim(c(1,1.5))+ ylim(c(6,8))
plot1 + geom_text_repel(aes(label=NAME),size=2)
```
